channel.title: Portfolios on Kolton Bodnovich
channel.description: Recent content in Portfolios on Kolton Bodnovich

item.title: Liquidation Nation
item.description: An updated report on Chapter 7 Bankruptcy in the US from 2001-2018

item.title: Abercrombie & Fitch
item.description: In Spring 2019 I collaborated with a team of fellow MBA students and Abercrombie & Fitch associates to complete a six sigma project and earn my green belt. The main focus of the project was to implement the DMAIC framework to reduce the occurrence of machine errors in the main distribution centerâ€™s outbound packaging process. Improving machine performance reduced the need for human intervention and enabled employees to focus on value added activities.

item.title: AB InBev
item.description: In 2017 I participated in the Anheuser Busch InBev case competition. My team made it to the final round where we presented to AB InBev executives in New York City.

item.title: Item without image
item.description: Far far away, behind the word mountains, far from the countries Vokalia and Consonantia, there live the blind texts. A small river named Duden flows by their place and supplies it with the necessary regelialia. It is a paradisematic country, in which roasted parts of sentences fly into your mouth.

item.title: Wall Art
item.description: I designed this MC Escher themed piece using Cricut Design Studio and cut the pieces from cardstock using a Cricut Air 2.

item.title: Name of the work 6
item.description: Fifth abundantly made Give sixth hath. Cattle creature i be don't them.

item.title: Anthem Inc.
item.description: Fifth abundantly made Give sixth hath. Cattle creature i be don't them.

item.title: Health Care Analytics
item.description: In this MBA course I was able to apply my newly acquired programming skills to a variety of analytical challenges based in the health care industry.
